Building.Description: A office building which contains 12 space and 16 staffs.

Behavior.Description: Researcher and senior 70% own office and 20% other office
Sec and Admin 45% own office, 45% other office
Manager 85% own office and 5% other office
Dark Light based on the model in Hunt, D. R. G. Predicting artificial lighting use - a method based upon observed patterns of behaviour. Light. Res. Technol. (1980).
Leaving more than 6 hours Light Off
Bright Light Off when higher than 300 lux
Spring and Fall set to 22.5 deg.C
Leave more than 6 hours AC Off
Leave more than 1 hours AC Off
